title: Charlie's Bar & Restaurant
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Caribbean, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Opened in 1941 when the city was a booming oil town. Is the oldest bar still operating on the island. Beers are $3.00 any day at any time. The owner, Charlie Jr., is a vegetarian so will make any dish vegetarian; vegans please inquire. Serves nine brands of beer and mixed drinks, most of them rum-based. Accepts traveler's checks and barter is an option as he collects miniature bottles and Zippo lighters.
